cause.description:
Brewing Culture is a creative renaissance that illumines the good, the true, and the beautiful through excellence and artistry for the glory of the Master Artist, the service of neighbor, and the renewal of culture.
1. Recruit 10,000 partners to donate $10/month to fund redemptive artists that have a culture-shaping vision to their work.
2. Build creative and creating communities in ten American cities.
3. Encourage “creative space” for contemplation and conversation about life’s deepest, most defining questions and themes.
cause.mission: Creating art and entertainment for the common good.
cause.name: Brewing Culture
